data.title: Brooks Elementary School
data.text:
In order to make sure we have enough buses next year, we are asking students seeking school bus transportation to register.

Any changes can be made as needed.

Brooks Bus Sign Up Form 2024-25

In conjunction with Medford Public Schoolsâ€™ celebration of Pride Month in June, the Brooks School held a Bee You Day on Friday, June 7th.

The theme this year was Be Proud of Who You Are.

We enjoyed celebrating PRIDE alongside students, staff, and families in our Hive, where everyone can be Proud of Who They Are.
